Class FXMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.view.FXMenuController
  • public class FXMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, which handles printing out information to GUI - equivalent of previous View class.

    1.0
    Author:
    Hanna Go≈õciniak

    • Method Detail

      • textInit

        public void textInit​(java.lang.String string)
        Public method for initializing object of Text class with string given by user
        Parameters:
        string - string typed in by user

      • newClicked

        public void newClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Public method for handling newButton click - changing stage to start one and clearing all text fields.
        Parameters:
        event - type of ActionEvent used to change stage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fxml won't be found in resources

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Public method initializing all tabs in this stage and running other methods of this class to do this. If there is no palindromes nor diacritics those tabs are being disabled and proper message is added as tooltip. The equivalent of this method in View class was printAll.

      • infoTextInit

        private void infoTextInit()
        Private method displaying information about text: string, words, number of chars and number of words. Information is being displayed on textInfoLabel in proper tab. The equivalent of this method in View class was printTextInfo.

      • lastCharInit

        private void lastCharInit()
        Private method displaying information about the last character of given text. It displays information about the number of times the last character is repeated in this text, along with information about the percentage of these letters. Information is being displayed on proper label in proper tab. The equivalent of this method in View class was printLastChar(text).

      • wordsInfoInit

        private void wordsInfoInit()
        Private method displaying information about number of words in given text as well as displaying information on how many words of a certain length are present in the text with a percentage value. Information is being displayed on proper label in proper tab and statistics are given in TableView. The equivalent of this method in View class was printWordsInfo.

      • palindromesInit

        private void palindromesInit()
        Private method displaying information about palindromes. It counts and displays information about the number of palindromes; if a given palindrome occurs more than 1 time, provide occurrence statistics for all such palindromes. As a extension to functionality also palindromes, which occur 1 time are printed out. Information is being displayed on proper label in proper tab and statistics are given in TableView. The equivalent of this method in View class was printPalindromesInfo.

      • diacriticsInit

        private void diacriticsInit()
        Private method displaying information about diacritical marks on proper label in proper tab. It displays in TableView number of diacritics along with information about the percentage of each diacritics in the text. The equivalent of this method in View class was printDiacriticsInfo.

      • setPrecision

        private double setPrecision​(double value)
        Private method setting precision of given value to two decimal places.
        Parameters:
        value - double type value that is going to be rounded
        Returns:
        rounded value

      • divide

        private double divide​(int a,
                      int b,
                      FXMenuController.Statistics op)
        Private method with lambda expression as a parameter
        Parameters:
        a - dividend
        b - divisor
        op - lambda expression
        Returns:
        result of operation

      • exception

        public void exception​(java.lang.String s)
        Public method printing out exception message when there is no input text
        Parameters:
        s - message to print out
